data.title: How did Dick Carson die?
data.meta_description: DICK Carson was famously known for his work behind the scenes on shows like The Merv Griffin Show, Wheel of Fortune and The Tonight Show.It was announ
data.text:
DICK Carson was famously known for his work behind the scenes on shows like The Merv Griffin Show, Wheel of Fortune and The Tonight Show.

It was announced on January 9, 2022, that he had passed away at the age of 92.

Who was Dick Carson?

Born June 4, 1929, Carson was known as an American television director who over the years, had won five Emmy Awards.

He was also famously known as the brother of American television host, comedian, writer, and producer, Johnny Carson, who tragically passed away on January 23, 2005.

Prior to his role in the entertainment industry, Carson served in the United States Navy for three years before joining the U.S. Naval Reserve for 11 additional years after graduating college with a degree in speech and radio.

Carson's service was reportedly a "source of pride," according to his obituary.

Following his retirement from duty, Carson then started his career in television.

Over the years, he worked on a number of shows including The Tonight Show Starring Johnny Carson, The Don Rickles Show, Get Smart, The Merv Griffin Show, and Wheel of Fortune.

How did he die?

Carson reportedly died on December 19, 2021, at his home in Studio City, California, after a brief illness, according to his family.

At this time, the illness remains unknown.

He is survived by his wife of 33 years, Karlyn; children, Douglas, Christopher, and Kathleen; grandchildren, Lindsey, Melissa and Chase; and great-granddaughter Peyton.

Who were Dick Carson's siblings?

Carson is the youngest of three children, including Johnny and Catherine Carson.

Prior to his death in 2005, Johnny was best known for his role on The Tonight Show, which won him six Primetime Emmy Awards, the Television Academy's 1980 Governor's Award, and a 1985 Peabody Award.

Johnny tragically passed away from respiratory failure caused by emphysema.

As for Catherine, not much information is available on her as she managed to stay out of the spotlight, despite her high-profile brothers.
